thread.title: Supreme Court Drops Case Pitting DOJ Against Microsoft

author: Brent Kendall
title: Supreme Court Drops Case Pitting DOJ Against Microsoft

organizations.name: supreme court drops case pitting doj against microsoft

text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The Supreme Court on Tuesday dropped from its docket a case that examined whether emails and other data stored overseas are subject to U.S. search warrants, following new legislation from Congress saying they are.
The case had pitted federal and state authorities against an array of leading tech companies. It centered on a dispute between the Justice Department and Microsoft Corp., which resisted complying with a warrant that sought emails from an account allegedly tied to illegal drug activity.
